content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Go back to the roots of 3-D fighting with Virtua Fighter 2™, the second title in AM2's flagship fighting franchise. Experience the legendary polygon-based 3-D graphics and fluid fighting mechanics that made the game so influential in the arcades, and later on the Sega Saturn. With all-new online play you can battle friends throughout the world.

Features include:

Arcade perfect with all-new online modes

All 10 original characters and arenas

Online versus mode for head-to-head matches

Online Room match mode for up to 6 players


1-2 players
585KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Players 2-6

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).

© SEGA. All rights reserved. Patent and Trademark Office. SEGA, the SEGA logo and Virtua Fighter are either registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA Corporation.
